languages.text: "Это не зн..." {n}Соломон вздыхает и устало трет переносицу.{/n} "Рад услужить помазанни{mf|ку|це} Императора".
"I'm not—" {n}Solomorne sighs and rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "It is my honour to serve the Emperor's anointed."
languages.original_text: "Это не зн..." {n}Соломон вздыхает и устало трет переносицу.{/n} "Рад услужить помазанни{mf|ку|це} Императора".

traits.locale_text: "I'm not—" {n}Solomorne sighs and rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "It is my honour to serve the Emperor's anointed."
"I'm not—" {n}Solomorne sighs and rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "It is my honour to serve the Emperor's anointed."
"I'm not—" {n}Solomorne sighs and rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "It is my honour to serve the Emperor's anointed."
"I'm not—" {n}Solomorne sighs and rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "It is my honour to serve the Emperor's anointed."
"I'm not—" {n}Solomorne sighs and rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "It is my honour to serve the Emperor's anointed."

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas... » {n}Solomorne pousse un soupir et se frotte l'arête du nez avec lassitude.{/n} « C'est un honneur de servir l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "I'm not—" {n}Solomorne sighs and rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "It is my honour to serve the Emperor's anointed."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas... » {n}Solomorne pousse un soupir et se frotte l'arête du nez avec lassitude.{/n} « C'est un honneur de servir l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: 「私は別に…」{n}ソロモーンはため息をつき、疲れたように鼻筋を指でこすった。{/n}「皇帝陛下に選ばれし御方に仕えることは、私の名誉です」
languages.original_text: "I'm not—" {n}Solomorne sighs and rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "It is my honour to serve the Emperor's anointed."

traits.locale_text: 「私は別に…」{n}ソロモーンはため息をつき、疲れたように鼻筋を指でこすった。{/n}「皇帝陛下に選ばれし御方に仕えることは、私の名誉です」

languages.text: «No estoy...». {n}Solomorne suspira y se frota la nariz, cansado.{/n} «Es un honor servir a{mf|l| la} ungid{mf|o|a} del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "I'm not—" {n}Solomorne sighs and rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "It is my honour to serve the Emperor's anointed."

traits.locale_text: «No estoy...». {n}Solomorne suspira y se frota la nariz, cansado.{/n} «Es un honor servir a{mf|l| la} ungid{mf|o|a} del Emperador».

languages.text: “我可不是——”{n}索罗蒙叹了口气，疲惫地揉着鼻梁。{/n}“能为帝皇的神选者服务，这是我的荣幸。”
languages.original_text: "I'm not—" {n}Solomorne sighs and rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "It is my honour to serve the Emperor's anointed."

traits.locale_text: “我可不是——”{n}索罗蒙叹了口气，疲惫地揉着鼻梁。{/n}“能为帝皇的神选者服务，这是我的荣幸。”

languages.text: "Hayır, ben..." {n}Solomorne, iç çekip iki kaşının ortasını bıkkınlıkla ovuşturuyor.{/n} "İmparator'a adanmış savaşçılara hizmet etmek, benim için şereftir."
languages.original_text: "I'm not—" {n}Solomorne sighs and rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "It is my honour to serve the Emperor's anointed."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır, ben..." {n}Solomorne iç çekip iki kaşının ortasını bıkkınlıkla ovuşturuyor.{/n} "İmparator'a adanmış savaşçılara hizmet etmek, benim için şereftir."

languages.text: "Ich bin nicht ..." {n}Solomorne seifzt und reibt sich müde seine Nasenflügel.{/n} "Es ist mir eine Ehre, {mf|dem|der} Gesalbten des Imperators zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "I'm not—" {n}Solomorne sighs and rubs the bridge of his nose wearily.{/n} "It is my honour to serve the Emperor's anointed."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin nicht ..." {n}Solomorne seifzt und reibt sich müde seine Nasenflügel.{/n} "Es ist mir eine Ehre, {mf|dem|der} Gesalbten des Imperators zu dienen."
